docs.text: making his directorial debut , actor jon favreau brings along his swingers co-star , vince vaughn , for this tale of two mugs on a career trajectory to nowheresville .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: favreau , who also wrote the script , is bobby , vaughn is ricky .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: by day they are construction workers .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they also are wanna-be contenders , but neither has had much success .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: their last bout pitted them against each other and was a draw , leaving bobby's record at 5-5-1 .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: these two l . a . not-so-wise guys also work for max ( peter falk ) , a mid-level mobster , who is patient and understanding with bobby , but who hates ricky's guts .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: max has an easy job for bobby ; fly to new york and make a simple delivery to a gangster named ruiz ( a smooth and silky sean combs ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: bobby , because of his lifelong friendship with ricky , pleads with max to give his pal another chance and let him tag along to the big apple .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: against his better judgment , max agrees .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: of course ricky , a motormouth who inserts both feet everytime he speaks , nearly screws up everything .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: while bobby tries to stay calm and professional , ricky begins swaggering and throwing money around as if he was john gotti or tony soprano .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the constrast in styles and the chemistry between favreau and vaughn is what makes made so enjoyable to watch .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: favreau with his hound-dog face and slow-burn personality could be a modern-day oliver hardy , only much wiser .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: vaughn is like someone vaccinated with a phonograph needle , he just keeps yakking and yakking , unaware of the havoc he creates .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: yet despite bobby's constant aggravation and agitation with his partner , a bond of affection and loyalty binds them .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the contrast between the two friends is interesting to watch .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: bobby is button-downed , tightly-wound , always waiting for the next shoe -courtesy of ricky - to drop .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ricky is mostly oblivious to the problems he creates and is genuinely surprised when he comes under attack for his faux paus .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in new york , the two lackeys are like fish out of water , stumbling from one situation to another , trying to keep alive .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: combs is elegant , cool and low-key menacing as the gangsta they are sent to meet .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: falk is amusing in his small role , while famke janssen nearly breaks your heart as bobby's lowlife girlfriend .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: more than anything , made is a movie with heart .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is loud , obnoxious and very talkative .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but the cameraderie between bobby and ricky holds the key to its interest .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: favreau does a commendable job in his directorial debut .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he is a player to be watched as he can only improve with experience .
docs.label: positive
